com.artemis

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.Manager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityObserver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComponentManager, EntityManager, GroupManager, PlayerManager, TagManager, TeamManager

    public abstract class Manager
extends java.lang.Object
implements EntityObserver
    A manager for handling entities in the world.
    Author:
    Arni Arent
